data.eml:eml: Three new species of European Platypalpus (Diptera, Hybotidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bartak, Miroslav, Kubik, Stepan (2015): Three new species of European Platypalpus (Diptera, Hybotidae). ZooKeys 470: 145-155, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.470.8967, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.470.8967
